title: Fix deployment error and promote Valentine app draft to live

requirements.text: Identify and fix the deployment/build error that is preventing the Valentine app from deploying successfully, ensuring the project builds and deploys cleanly.

quotes: Please fix it and go live

acceptanceCriteria: A clean build completes without errors.
A deploy to the Internet Computer completes successfully (no deployment error).
The deployed app loads in the browser without a runtime crash and both routes ('/' and '/coupon') render correctly.

requirements.text: After the deployment/build error is resolved, promote the currently deployed draft version of the Valentineâ€™s app to the live production environment (make the draft go live).

quotes: Please fix it and go live

acceptanceCriteria: The live/production environment serves the latest successfully deployed draft build.
Navigating to the production URL shows the Valentine landing page, and the CTA navigation to the coupon page works end-to-end.

constraints: Respect the existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture; keep all backend logic in backend/main.mo and add backend/migration.mo only if state upgrades are required.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding new product features beyond fixing the build/deploy issue and promoting the draft to live.
Introducing external databases, third-party auth providers, or non-supported hosting/deployment platforms.
